title: Are You an Effective Communicator?  You Can Be Workshop!
desc:
Are you an effective communicator?? You can be, I'll show you how. 
 In this workshop you will learn key strategies to speak your truth and do it beautifully. 
 People are desperate to be heard, desperate to say what they need and want to say but we've completely lost ourselves in what others think, say, do...it's time to reclaim your power, your message, your truth, YOUR FREEDOM.? I'll show you how. 
 In this 4 hour workshop you will learn key strategies that will help you in work, life and beyond. 
 The power of verbals and non-verbals 
 Claiming your space 
 Finding the right words and knowing when to pause 
 Dealing with diffiuclt co-workers 
 The power of the pause 
 and so much more! 
 Head into the holidays stronger than ever before! 
 Join internationally known speaking and communication expert Tracy Goodwin as she leads this life changing communication workshop. 
 4 hours, $75.00 Space is very limited for this hands on workshop!
